text: This article is a list of prime ministers of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines. ==Prime ministers of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines (1979–present)== Portrait Name Election Term of office Political party Took office Left office Time in office 1 Milton Cato 1979 27 October 1979 30 July 1984 Saint Vincent Labour Party 2 Sir James Fitz- Allen Mitchell 1984 1989 1994 1998 30 July 1984 27 October 2000 New Democratic Party 3 Arnhim Eustace — 27 October 2000 29 March 2001 New Democratic Party 4 Ralph Gonsalves 2001 2005 2010 2015 2020 29 March 2001 Incumbent Unity Labour Party ==References==
title: List of prime ministers of Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
